activities:
Students in the EU provide the following personal information:
Name
Address
email Address
Date of Birth
An image of dated credentials that attest to their enrollment in an accredited educational institution
 
Valid proof of enrollment confers to students the right to purchase products and services under programs that offer substantial price reductions from the commercial prices available to the general public.
 
All personal information and images of the credentials are retained for two years.  After two years all of the information is destroyed.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
